catalog_info.title: Early Christian Thought 2: The Latin Tradition
catalog_info.notes: Tu., Th., 11:30–1 and hour to be arranged. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1750.
catalog_info.description: This introductory course will focus on the major Latin authors of the late antique Christian West (second through ninth centuries). Authors will include Tertullian, Ambrose, Jerome, Augustine, Cassian, Gregory the Great, Boethius, and John Scottus Eriugena.
